devdoc.details: A simple betting smart contract with SiweAuth integration for Oasis Sapphire Users can place bets, contract acts as escrow, and owner can manage funds

cancelBet(uint256,bytes).details: Cancel a bet and refund (only owner)

getBetSecret(uint256,bytes).details: Get secret data for a specific bet (only bet owner can access)

params.betIndex: Index of the bet in the _betMetas array

getUserBets(bytes,uint256,uint256).details: Get user's bets using SIWE authentication

params.sig: The signature of the SIWE message

placeBet(uint8,string,bytes).details: Place a bet with amount and outcome

params.secretData: Private data associated with the bet

params.won: Whether the bet won or lost

devdoc.title: SimpleBet

SiweAuth_AddressMismatch().notice: User address in the SIWE message does not match the message signer's address

SiweAuth_ChainIdMismatch().notice: Chain ID in the SIWE message does not match the actual chain ID

SiweAuth_DomainMismatch().notice: Domain in the SIWE message does not match the domain of a dApp

SiweAuth_Expired().notice: Validity of the authentication token or the Expires value in the SIWE message is in the past

SiweAuth_NotBeforeInFuture().notice: The Not before value in the SIWE message is still in the future

SiweParser_InvalidAddressLength().notice: Invalid length of the hex-encoded address

domain().notice: Return the domain associated with the dApp.

login(string,(bytes32,bytes32,uint256)).notice: Login using a SIWE message and signature
